channel.title: Barrage Accuracy Through prayer + Freezing Time
channel.description:
The server im currently using, has a few things i really need to fix, but i dont really understand how you would go about changing these.
When Barraging/Blitzing, If the other player has magic prayer enabled, Barrage hits like 1/15 times.
When Barraging/Blitzing, The time the player is frozen is near 2x the ammount it should be.
If anyone could help me with these problems i would greatly appreciate it.
And btw its a Delta.
